translated: OF THE PRIMEUAL PRIESTS ASSUMD POWER
WHEN ETERNALS SPURND BAKK HIS RELIGIAN
AND GAUE HIM A PLAKE IN THE NORTH
OBSKURE SHADOWY UOID SOLITARY
ETERNALS I HEAR YOUR KALL GLADLY
DIKTATE SWIFT WINGED WORDS AND FEAR NOT
TO UNFOLD YOUR DARK UISIANS OF TORMENT
LO A SHADOW OF HORROR IS RISEN
IN ETERNITY UNKNOWN UNPROLIFIK
SELF KLOSD ALL REPELLING WHAT DEMON
HATH FORMD THIS ABOMINABLE UOID
THIS SOUL SHUDDRING UAKUUM SOME SAID
IT IS URISEN BUT UNKNOWN ABSTRAKTED
BROODING SEKRET THE DARK POWER HID
TIMES ON TIMES HE DIUIDED AND MEASURD
SPAKE BY SPAKE IN HIS NINEFOLD DARKNESS
UNSEEN UNKNOWN KHAINGES APPEARD
IN HIS DESOLATE MOUNTAINS RIFTED FURIAUS
BY THE BLAKK WINDS OF PERTURBATIAN
FOR HE STROUE IN BATTLES DIRE
IN UNSEEN KONFLIKTIANS WITH SHAPES
BRED FROM HIS FORSAKEN WILDERNESS
OF BEAST BIRD FISH SERPENT AND ELEMENT
KOMBUSTIAN BLAST UAPOUR AND KLOUD
DARK REUOLUING IN SILENT AKTIUITY
UNSEEN IN TORMENTING PASSIANS
AN AKTIUITY UNKNOWN AND HORRIBLE
A SELF KONTEMPLATING SHADOW
IN ENORMOUS LABOURS OKKUPIED
BUT ETERNALS BEHELD HIS UAST FORESTS
AGE ON AGES HE LAY KLOSD UNKNOWN
BROODING SHUT IN THE DEEP ALL AUOID
THE PETRIFIK ABOMINABLE KHAOS
HIS KOLD HORRORS SILENT DARK URISEN
PREPARD HIS TEN THOUSANDS OF THUNDERS
RAINGD IN GLOOMD ARRAY STRETKH OUT AKROSS
THE DREAD WORLD AND THE ROLLING OF WHEELS
AS OF SWELLING SEAS SOUND IN HIS KLOUDS
IN HIS HILLS OF STORD SNOWS IN HIS MOUNTAINS
OF HAIL AND IKE UOIKES OF TERROR
ARE HEARD LIKE THUNDERS OF AUTUMN
WHEN THE KLOUD BLASES OUER THE HARUESTS
EARTH WAS NOT NOR GLOBES OF ATTRAKTIAN
THE WILL OF THE IMMORTAL EXPANDED
OR KONTRAKTED HIS ALL FLEXIBLE SENSES
DEATH WAS NOT BUT ETERNAL LIFE SPRUING
THE SOUND OF A TRUMPET THE HEAUENS
AWOKE AND UAST KLOUDS OF BLOOD ROLLD
ROUND THE DIM ROKKS OF URISEN SO NAMD
THAT SOLITARY ONE IN IMMENSITY
SHRILL THE TRUMPET AND MYRIADS OF ETERNITY
MUSTER AROUND THE BLEAK DESARTS
NOW FILLD WITH KLOUDS DARKNESS AND WATERS
THAT ROLLD PERPLEXD LABRING AND UTTERD
WORDS ARTIKULATE BURSTING IN THUNDERS
THAT ROLLD ON THE TOPS OF HIS MOUNTAINS
FROM THE DEPTHS OF DARK SOLITUDE FROM
THE ETERNAL ABODE IN MY HOLINESS
HIDDEN SET APART IN MY STERN KOUNSELS
RESERUD FOR THE DAYS OF FUTURITY
I HAUE SOUGHT FOR A JOY WITHOUT PAIN
FOR A SOLID WITHOUT FLUKTUATIAN
WHY WILL YOU DIE O ETERNALS
WHY LIUE IN UNUENKHABLE BURNINGS
FIRST I FOUGHT WITH THE FIRE KONSUMD
INWARDS INTO A DEEP WORLD WITHIN
A UOID IMMENSE WILD DARK AND DEEP
WHERE NOTHING WAS NATURES WIDE WOMB
AND SELF BALANKD STRETKHD OER THE UOID
I ALONE EUEN I THE WINDS MERKILESS
BOUND BUT KONDENSING IN TORRENTS
THEY FALL AND FALL STROING I REPELLD
THE UAST WAUES AND AROSE ON THE WATERS
A WIDE WORLD OF SOLID OBSTRUKTIAN
HERE ALONE I IN BOOKS FORMD OF METALS
HAUE WRITTEN THE SEKRETS OF WISDOM
THE SEKRETS OF DARK KONTEMPLATIAN
BY FIGHTINGS AND KONFLIKTS DIRE
WITH TERRIBLE MONSTERS SIN BRED
WHIKH THE BOSOMS OF ALL INHABIT
SEUEN DEADLY SINS OF THE SOUL
LO I UNFOLD MY DARKNESS AND ON
THIS ROKK PLAKE WITH STROING HAND THE BOOK
OF ETERNAL BRASS WRITTEN IN MY SOLITUDE
LAWS OF PEAKE OF LOUE OF UNITY
OF PITY KOMPASSIAN FORGIUENESS
LET EAKH KHUSE ONE HABITATIAN
HIS ANKIENT INFINITE MANSIAN
ONE KOMMAND ONE JOY ONE DESIRE
ONE KURSE ONE WEIGHT ONE MEASURE
ONE KING ONE GOD ONE LAW
THE UOIKE ENDED THEY SAW HIS PALE UISAGE
EMERGE FROM THE DARKNESS HIS HAND
ON THE ROKK OF ETERNITY UNKLASPING
THE BOOK OF BRASS RAGE SIESD THE STROING
RAGE FURY INTENSE INDIGNATIAN
IN KATARAKTS OF FIRE BLOOD AND GALL
IN WHIRLWINDS OF SULPHUROUS SMOKE
AND ENORMOUS FORMS OF ENERGY
ALL THE SEUEN DEADLY SINS OF THE SOUL
IN LIUING KREATIANS APPEARD
IN THE FLAMES OF ETERNAL FURY
SUNDRING DARKNING THUNDRING
RENT AWAY WITH A TERRIBLE KRASH
ETERNITY ROLLD WIDE APART
WIDE ASUNDER ROLLING
MOUNTAINOUS ALL AROUND
DEPARTING DEPARTING DEPARTING
LEAUING RUINOUS FRAGMENTS OF LIFE
HAINGING FROWNING KLIFFS AND ALL BETWEEN
AN OKEAN OF UOIDNESS UNFATHOMABLE
THE ROARING FIRES RAN OER THE HEAUNS
IN WHIRLWINDS AND KATARAKTS OF BLOOD
AND OER THE DARK DESARTS OF URISEN
FIRES POUR THRO THE UOID ON ALL SIDES
ON URISENS SELF BEGOTTEN ARMIES
BUT NO LIGHT FROM THE FIRES ALL WAS DARKNESS
IN THE FLAMES OF ETERNAL FURY
IN FIERKE AINGUISH AND UENKHLESS FLAMES
TO THE DESARTS AND ROKKS HE RAN RAGING
TO HIDE BUT HE KOULD NOT KOMBINING
HE DUG MOUNTAINS AND HILLS IN UAST STREINGTH
HE PILED THEM IN INKESSANT LABOUR
IN HOWLINGS AND PAINGS AND FIERKE MADNESS
LOING PERIADS IN BURNING FIRES LABOURING
TILL HOARY AND AGE BROKE AND AGED
IN DESPAIR AND THE SHADOWS OF DEATH
AND A ROOF UAST PETRIFIK AROUND
ON ALL SIDES HE FRAMD LIKE A WOMB
WHERE THOUSANDS OF RIUERS IN UEINS
OF BLOOD POUR DOWN THE MOUNTAINS TO KOOL
THE ETERNAL FIRES BEATING WITHOUT
FROM ETERNALS AND LIKE A BLAKK GLOBE
UIEWD BY SONS OF ETERNITY STANDING
ON THE SHORE OF THE INFINITE OKEAN
LIKE A HUMAN HEART STRUGLING AND BEATING
THE UAST WORLD OF URISEN APPEARD
AND LOS ROUND THE DARK GLOBE OF URISEN
KEPT WATKH FOR ETERNALS TO KONFINE
THE OBSKURE SEPARATIAN ALONE
FOR ETERNITY STOOD WIDE APART
AS THE STARS ARE APART FROM THE EARTH
LOS WEPT HOWLING AROUND THE DARK DEMON
AND KURSING HIS LOT FOR IN AINGUISH
URISEN WAS RENT FROM HIS SIDE
AND A FATHOMLESS UOID FOR HIS FEET
AND INTENSE FIRES FOR HIS DWELLING
BUT URISEN LAID IN A STONY SLEEP
UNORGANISD RENT FROM ETERNITY
THE ETERNALS SAID WHAT IS THIS DEATH
URISEN IS A KLOD OF KLAY
LOS HOWLD IN A DISMAL STUPOR
GROANING GNASHING GROANING
TILL THE WRENKHING APART WAS HEALED
BUT THE WRENKHING OF URISEN HEALD NOT
KOLD FEATURELESS FLESH OR KLAY
RIFTED WITH DIREFUL KHAINGES
HE LAY IN A DREAMLESS NIGHT
TILL LOS ROUSD HIS FIRES AFFRIGHTED
AT THE FORMLESS UNMEASURABLE DEATH
LOS SMITTEN WITH ASTONISHMENT
FRIGHTEND AT THE HURTLING BONES
AND AT THE SURGING SULPHUREOUS
PERTURBED IMMORTAL MAD RAGING
IN WHIRLWINDS AND PITKH AND NITRE
ROUND THE FURIAUS LIMBS OF LOS
AND LOS FORMED NETS AND GINS
AND THREW THE NETS ROUND ABOUT
HE WATKHD IN SHUDDRING FEAR
THE DARK KHAINGES AND BOUND EUERY KHAINGE
WITH RIUETS OF IRON AND BRASS
AND THESE WERE THE KHAINGES OF URISEN
AGES ON AGES ROLLD OUER HIM
IN STONY SLEEP AGES ROLLD OUER HIM
LIKE A DARK WASTE STRETKHING KHAINGABLE
BY EARTHUAKES RIUN BELKHING SULLEN FIRES
ON AGES ROLLD AGES IN GHASTLY
SIKK TORMENT AROUND HIM IN WHIRLWINDS
OF DARKNESS THE ETERNAL PROPHET HOWLD
BEATING STILL ON HIS RIUETS OF IRON
POURING SODOR OF IRON DIUIDING
THE HORRIBLE NIGHT INTO WATKHES
AND URISEN SO HIS ETERNAL NAME
HIS PROLIFIK DELIGHT OBSKURD MORE AND MORE
IN DARK SEKRESY HIDING IN SURGEING
SULPHUREOUS FLUID HIS PHANTASIES
THE ETERNAL PROPHET HEAUD THE DARK BELLOWS
AND TURND RESTLESS THE TOINGS AND THE HAMMER
INKESSANT BEAT FORGING KHAINS NEW AND NEW
NUMBRING WITH LINKS HOURS DAYS AND YEARS
THE ETERNAL MIND BOUNDED BEGAN TO ROLL
EDDIES OF WRATH KEASELESS ROUND AND ROUND
AND THE SULPHUREOUS FOAM SURGEING THIKK
SETTLED A LAKE BRIGHT AND SHINING KLEAR
WHITE AS THE SNOW ON THE MOUNTAINS KOLD
FORGETFULNESS DUMBNESS NEKESSITY
IN KHAINS OF THE MIND LOKKED UP
LIKE FETTERS OF IKE SHRINKING TOGETHER
DISORGANISD RENT FROM ETERNITY
LOS BEAT ON HIS FETTERS OF IRON
AND HEATED HIS FURNAKES AND POURD
IRON SODOR AND SODOR OF BRASS
RESTLESS TURND THE IMMORTAL INKHAIND
HEAUING DOLOROUS AINGUISHD UNBEARABLE
TILL A ROOF SHAGGY WILD INKLOSD
IN AN ORB HIS FOUNTAIN OF THOUGHT
IN A HORRIBLE DREAMFUL SLUMBER
LIKE THE LINKED INFERNAL KHAIN
A UAST SPINE WRITHD IN TORMENT
UPON THE WINDS SHOOTING PAIND
RIBS LIKE A BENDING KAUERN
AND BONES OF SOLIDNESS FROSE
OUER ALL HIS NERUES OF JOY
AND A FIRST AGE PASSED OUER
AND A STATE OF DISMAL WOE
FROM THE KAUERNS OF HIS JOINTED SPINE
DOWN SUNK WITH FRIGHT A RED
ROUND GLOBE HOT BURNING DEEP
DEEP DOWN INTO THE ABYSS
PANTING KOINGLOBING TREMBLING
SHOOTING OUT TEN THOUSAND BRANKHES
AROUND HIS SOLID BONES
AND A SEKOND AGE PASSED OUER
AND A STATE OF DISMAL WOE
IN HARROWING FEAR ROLLING ROUND
HIS NERUOUS BRAIN SHOT BRANKHES
ROUND THE BRANKHES OF HIS HEART
ON HIGH INTO TWO LITTLE ORBS
AND FIXED IN TWO LITTLE KAUES
HIDING KAREFULLY FROM THE WIND
HIS EYES BEHELD THE DEEP
AND A THIRD AGE PASSED OUER
AND A STATE OF DISMAL WOE
THE PAINGS OF HOPE BEGAN
IN HEAUY PAIN STRIUING STRUGGLING
TWO EARS IN KLOSE UOLUTIANS
FROM BENEATH HIS ORBS OF UISIAN
SHOT SPIRING OUT AND PETRIFIED
AS THEY GREW AND A FOURTH AGE PASSED
AND A STATE OF DISMAL WOE
IN GHASTLY TORMENT SIKK
HAINGING UPON THE WIND
TWO NOSTRILS BENT DOWN TO THE DEEP
AND A FIFTH AGE PASSED OUER
AND A STATE OF DISMAL WOE
IN GHASTLY TORMENT SIKK
WITHIN HIS RIBS BLOATED ROUND
A KRAUING HUINGRY KAUERN
THENKE AROSE HIS KHANNELD THROAT
AND LIKE A RED FLAME A TOINGUE
OF THIRST AND OF HUINGER APPEARD
AND A SIXTH AGE PASSED OUER
AND A STATE OF DISMAL WOE
ENRAGED AND STIFLED WITH TORMENT
HE THREW HIS RIGHT ARM TO THE NORTH
HIS LEFT ARM TO THE SOUTH
SHOOTING OUT IN AINGUISH DEEP
AND HIS FEET STAMPD THE NETHER ABYSS
IN TREMBLING AND HOWLING AND DISMAY
AND A SEUENTH AGE PASSED OUER
AND A STATE OF DISMAL WOE
IN TERRORS LOS SHRUNK FROM HIS TASK
HIS GREAT HAMMER FELL FROM HIS HAND
HIS FIRES BEHELD AND SIKKENING
HID THEIR STROING LIMBS IN SMOKE
FOR WITH NOISES RUINOUS LOUD
WITH HURTLINGS AND KLASHINGS AND GROANS
THE IMMORTAL ENDURD HIS KHAINS
THO BOUND IN A DEADLY SLEEP
ALL THE MYRIADS OF ETERNITY
ALL THE WISDOM AND JOY OF LIFE
ROLL LIKE A SEA AROUND HIM
EXKEPT WHAT HIS LITTLE ORBS
OF SIGHT BY DEGREES UNFOLD
AND NOW HIS ETERNAL LIFE
LIKE A DREAM WAS OBLITERATED
SHUDDRING THE ETERNAL PROPHET SMOTE
WITH A STROKE FROM HIS NORTH TO SOUTH REGIAN
THE BELLOWS AND HAMMER ARE SILENT NOW
A NERUELESS SILENKE HIS PROPHETIK UOIKE
SIESD A KOLD SOLITUDE AND DARK UOID
THE ETERNAL PROPHET AND URISEN KLOSD
AGES ON AGES ROLLD OUER THEM
KUT OFF FROM LIFE AND LIGHT FROSEN
INTO HORRIBLE FORMS OF DEFORMITY
LOS SUFFERD HIS FIRES TO DEKAY
THEN HE LOOKD BAKK WITH ANXIAUS DESIRE
BUT THE SPAKE UNDIUIDED BY EXISTENKE
STRUKK HORROR INTO HIS SOUL
LOS WEPT OBSKURD WITH MOURNING
HIS BOSOM EARTHUAKD WITH SIGHS
HE SAW URISEN DEADLY BLAKK
IN HIS KHAINS BOUND AND PITY BEGAN
IN AINGUISH DIUIDING AND DIUIDING
FOR PITY DIUIDES THE SOUL
IN PAINGS ETERNITY ON ETERNITY
LIFE IN KATARAKTS POURD DOWN HIS KLIFFS
THE UOID SHRUNK THE LYMPH INTO NERUES
WANDRING WIDE ON THE BOSOM OF NIGHT
AND LEFT A ROUND GLOBE OF BLOOD
TREMBLING UPON THE UOID
THUS THE ETERNAL PROPHET WAS DIUIDED
BEFORE THE DEATH IMAGE OF URISEN
FOR IN KHAINGEABLE KLOUDS AND DARKNESS
IN A WINTERLY NIGHT BENEATH
THE ABYSS OF LOS STRETKHD IMMENSE
AND NOW SEEN NOW OBSKURD TO THE EYES
OF ETERNALS THE UISIANS REMOTE
OF THE DARK SEPERATIAN APPEARD
AS GLASSES DISKOUER WORLDS
IN THE ENDLESS ABYSS OF SPAKE
SO THE EXPANDING EYES OF IMMORTALS
BEHELD THE DARK UISIANS OF LOS
AND THE GLOBE OF LIFE BLOOD TREMBLING
THE GLOBE OF LIFE BLOOD TREMBLED
BRANKHING OUT INTO ROOTS
FIBROUS WRITHING UPON THE WINDS
FIBRES OF BLOOD MILK AND TEARS
IN PAINGS ETERNITY ON ETERNITY
AT LEINGTH IN TEARS AND KRIES IMBODIED
A FEMALE FORM TREMBLING AND PALE
WAUES BEFORE HIS DEATHY FAKE
ALL ETERNITY SHUDDERD AT SIGHT
OF THE FIRST FEMALE NOW SEPARATE
PALE AS A KLOUD OF SNOW
WAUING BEFORE THE FAKE OF LOS
WONDER AWE FEAR ASTONISHMENT
PETRIFY THE ETERNAL MYRIADS
AT THE FIRST FEMALE FORM NOW SEPARATE
THEY KALLD HER PITY AND FLED
SPREAD A TENT WITH STROING KURTAINS AROUND THEM
LET KORDS AND STAKES BIND IN THE UOID
THAT ETERNALS MAY NO MORE BEHOLD THEM
THEY BEGAN TO WEAUE KURTAINS OF DARKNESS
THEY EREKTED LARGE PILLARS ROUND THE UOID
WITH GOLDEN HOOKS FASTEND IN THE PILLARS
WITH INFINITE LABOUR THE ETERNALS
A WOOF WOUE AND KALLED IT SKIENKE
BUT LOS SAW THE FEMALE AND PITIED
HE EMBRAKD HER SHE WEPT SHE REFUSD
IN PERUERSE AND KRUEL DELIGHT
SHE FLED FROM HIS ARMS YET HE FOLLOWD
ETERNITY SHUDDERD WHEN THEY SAW
MAN BEGETTING HIS LIKENESS
ON HIS OWN DIUIDED IMAGE
A TIME PASSED OUER THE ETERNALS
BEGAN TO EREKT THE TENT
WHEN ENITHARMON SIKK
FELT A WORM WITHIN HER WOMB
YET HELPLESS IT LAY LIKE A WORM
IN THE TREMBLING WOMB
TO BE MOULDED INTO EXISTENKE
ALL DAY THE WORM LAY ON HER BOSOM
ALL NIGHT WITHIN HER WOMB
THE WORM LAY TILL IT GREW TO A SERPENT
WITH DOLOROUS HISSINGS AND POISONS
ROUND ENITHARMONS LOINS FOLDING
KOILD WITHIN ENITHARMONS WOMB
THE SERPENT GREW KASTING ITS SKALES
WITH SHARP PAINGS THE HISSINGS BEGAN
TO KHAINGE TO A GRATING KRY
MANY SORROWS AND DISMAL THROES
MANY FORMS OF FISH BIRD AND BEAST
BROUGHT FORTH AN INFANT FORM
WHERE WAS A WORM BEFORE
THE ETERNALS THEIR TENT FINISHED
ALARMD WITH THESE GLOOMY UISIANS
WHEN ENITHARMON GROANING
PRODUKD A MAN KHILD TO THE LIGHT
A SHRIEK RAN THRO ETERNITY
AND A PARALYTIK STROKE
AT THE BIRTH OF THE HUMAN SHADOW
DELUING EARTH IN HIS RESISTLESS WAY
HOWLING THE KHILD WITH FIERKE FLAMES
ISSUD FROM ENITHARMON
THE ETERNALS KLOSED THE TENT
THEY BEAT DOWN THE STAKES THE KORDS
STRETKHD FOR A WORK OF ETERNITY
NO MORE LOS BEHELD ETERNITY
IN HIS HANDS HE SIESD THE INFANT
HE BATHED HIM IN SPRINGS OF SORROW
HE GAUE HIM TO ENITHARMON
THEY NAMED THE KHILD ORK HE GREW
FED WITH MILK OF ENITHARMON
LOS AWOKE HER O SORROW AND PAIN
A TIGHTNING GIRDLE GREW
AROUND HIS BOSOM IN SOBBINGS
HE BURST THE GIRDLE IN TWAIN
BUT STILL ANOTHER GIRDLE
OPRESSD HIS BOSOM IN SOBBINGS
AGAIN HE BURST IT AGAIN
ANOTHER GIRDLE SUKKEEDS
THE GIRDLE WAS FORMD BY DAY
BY NIGHT WAS BURST IN TWAIN
THESE FALLING DOWN ON THE ROKK
INTO AN IRON KHAIN
IN EAKH OTHER LINK BY LINK LOKKD
THEY TOOK ORK TO THE TOP OF A MOUNTAIN
O HOW ENITHARMON WEPT
THEY KHAIND HIS YOUING LIMBS TO THE ROKK
WITH THE KHAIN OF JEALOUSY
BENEATH URISENS DEATHFUL SHADOW
THE DEAD HEARD THE UOIKE OF THE KHILD
AND BEGAN TO AWAKE FROM SLEEP
ALL THINGS HEARD THE UOIKE OF THE KHILD
AND BEGAN TO AWAKE TO LIFE
AND URISEN KRAUING WITH HUINGER
STUING WITH THE ODOURS OF NATURE
EXPLORD HIS DENS AROUND
HE FORMD A LINE AND A PLUMMET
TO DIUIDE THE ABYSS BENEATH
HE FORMD A DIUIDING RULE
HE FORMED SKALES TO WEIGH
HE FORMED MASSY WEIGHTS
HE FORMED A BRASEN UADRANT
HE FORMED GOLDEN KOMPASSES
AND BEGAN TO EXPLORE THE ABYSS
AND HE PLANTED A GARDEN OF FRUITS
BUT LOS ENKIRKLED ENITHARMON
WITH FIRES OF PROPHEKY
FROM THE SIGHT OF URISEN AND ORK
AND SHE BORE AN ENORMOUS RAKE
URISEN EXPLORD HIS DENS
MOUNTAIN MOOR AND WILDERNESS
WITH A GLOBE OF FIRE LIGHTING HIS JOURNEY
A FEARFUL JOURNEY ANNOYD
BY KRUEL ENORMITIES FORMS
OF LIFE ON HIS FORSAKEN MOUNTAINS
AND HIS WORLD TEEMD UAST ENORMITIES
FRIGHTNING FAITHLESS FAWNING
PORTIANS OF LIFE SIMILITUDES
OF A FOOT OR A HAND OR A HEAD
OR A HEART OR AN EYE THEY SWAM MISKHEUOUS
DREAD TERRORS DELIGHTING IN BLOOD
MOST URISEN SIKKEND TO SEE
HIS ETERNAL KREATIANS APPEAR
SONS AND DAUGHTERS OF SORROW ON MOUNTAINS
WEEPING WAILING FIRST THIRIEL APPEARD
ASTONISHD AT HIS OWN EXISTENKE
LIKE A MAN FROM A KLOUD BORN AND UTHA
FROM THE WATERS EMERGING LAMENTS
GRODNA RENT THE DEEP EARTH HOWLING
AMASD HIS HEAUENS IMMENSE KRAKKS
LIKE THE GROUND PARKHD WITH HEAT THEN FUSON
FLAMD OUT FIRST BEGOTTEN LAST BORN
ALL HIS ETERNAL SONS IN LIKE MANNER
HIS DAUGHTERS FROM GREEN HERBS AND KATTLE
FROM MONSTERS AND WORMS OF THE PIT
HE IN DARKNESS KLOSD UIEWD ALL HIS RAKE
AND HIS SOUL SIKKEND HE KURSD
BOTH SONS AND DAUGHTERS FOR HE SAW
THAT NO FLESH NOR SPIRIT KOULD KEEP
HIS IRON LAWS ONE MOMENT
FOR HE SAW THAT LIFE LIUD UPON DEATH
THE OX IN THE SLAUGHTER HOUSE MOANS
THE DOG AT THE WINTRY DOOR
AND HE WEPT AND HE KALLED IT PITY
AND HIS TEARS FLOWED DOWN ON THE WINDS
KOLD HE WANDERD ON HIGH OUER THEIR KITIES
IN WEEPING AND PAIN AND WOE
AND WHERE EUER HE WANDERD IN SORROWS
UPON THE AGED HEAUENS
A KOLD SHADOW FOLLOWD BEHIND HIM
LIKE A SPIDERS WEB MOIST KOLD AND DIM
DRAWING OUT FROM HIS SORROWING SOUL
THE DUINGEON LIKE HEAUEN DIUIDING
WHERE EUER THE FOOTSTEPS OF URISEN
WALKD OUER THE KITIES IN SORROW
TILL A WEB DARK AND KOLD THROUGHOUT ALL
THE TORMENTED ELEMENT STRETKHD
FROM THE SORROWS OF URISENS SOUL
AND THE WEB IS A FEMALE IN EMBRIA
NONE KOULD BREAK THE WEB NO WINGS OF FIRE
SO TWISTED THE KORDS AND SO KNOTTED
THE MESHES TWISTED LIKE TO THE HUMAN BRAIN
AND ALL KALLD IT THE NET OF RELIGIAN
THEN THE INHABITANTS OF THOSE KITIES
FELT THEIR NERUES KHAINGE INTO MARROW
AND HARDENING BONES BEGAN
IN SWIFT DISEASES AND TORMENTS
IN THROBBINGS AND SHOOTINGS AND GRINDINGS
THRO ALL THE KOASTS TILL WEAKEND
THE SENSES INWARD RUSHD SHRINKING
BENEATH THE DARK NET OF INFEKTIAN
TILL THE SHRUNKEN EYES KLOUDED OUER
BDISKERND NOT THE WOUEN HIPOKRISY
BUT THE STREAKY SLIME IN THEIR HEAUENS
BROUGHT TOGETHER BY NARROWING PERKEPTIANS
APPEARD TRANSPARENT AIR FOR THEIR EYES
GREW SMALL LIKE THE EYES OF A MAN
AND IN REPTILE FORMS SHRINKING TOGETHER
OF SEUEN FEET STATURE THEY REMAIND
SIX DAYS THEY SHRUNK UP FROM EXISTENKE
AND ON THE SEUENTH DAY THEY RESTED
AND THEY BLESSD THE SEUENTH DAY IN SIKK HOPE
AND FORGOT THEIR ETERNAL LIFE
AND THEIR THIRTY KITIES DIUIDED
IN FORM OF A HUMAN HEART
NO MORE KOULD THEY RISE AT WILL
IN THE INFINITE UOID BUT BOUND DOWN
TO EARTH BY THEIR NARROWING PERKEPTIANS
THEY LIUED A PERIAD OF YEARS
THEN LEFT A NOISOM BODY
TO THE JAWS OF DEUOURING DARKNESS
AND THEIR KHILDREN WEPT AND BUILT
TOMBS IN THE DESOLATE PLAKES
AND FORMD LAWS OF PRUDENKE AND KALLD THEM
THE ETERNAL LAWS OF GOD
AND THE THIRTY KITIES REMAIND
SURROUNDED BY SALT FLOODS NOW KALLD
AFRIKA ITS NAME WAS THEN EGYPT
THE REMAINING SONS OF URISEN
BEHELD THEIR BRETHREN SHRINK TOGETHER
BENEATH THE NET OF URISEN
PERSWASIAN WAS IN UAIN
FOR THE EARS OF THE INHABITANTS
WERE WITHERD AND DEAFEND AND KOLD
AND THEIR EYES KOULD NOT DISKERN
THEIR BRETHREN OF OTHER KITIES
SO FUSON KALLD ALL TOGETHER
THE REMAINING KHILDREN OF URISEN
AND THEY LEFT THE PENDULOUS EARTH
THEY KALLED IT EGYPT AND LEFT IT
AND THE SALT OKEAN ROLLED EINGLOBD
